attributes.name: position
attributes.description: Position of the tooltip, will flip if there is not enough space

attributes.name: tabindex
attributes.description: Tabindex to make the tooltip focusable

attributes.name: id
attributes.description: Other Elements can use this id to reference the Tooltip, if not set the Tooltip refers to its parent Element

attributes.name: open
attributes.description: Deprecated! It is just used to animate show and open. When animating popovers is supported, this will be removed.

attributes.name: :position-x
attributes.description: Read Only! Deprecated! Real position of the tooltip in x direction used for arrow-styling. When custom states or anchore positionin arive this will be removed.

attributes.name: :position-y
attributes.description: Read Only! Deprecated! Real position of the tooltip in y direction used for arrow-styling. When custom states or anchore positionin arive this will be removed.
